feed.title: Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:57 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 3:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 33 %
Dewpoint: -13.8°C
Wind: ESE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening then snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
